content: direct pattern link 1 skill level easy materials 9 10 10 skeins cascade yarns® elysian 6 60% superwash merino wool 40% acrylic 100 g 3 5 oz 145 yds 133 m color 58 cedar green us 9 5 5 mm 32-inch knitting needles or size to obtain gauge us 9 5 5 mm 16-inch knitting needles or size to obtain gauge yarn needle stitch markers sizes s/m l/xl 2xl/3xl finished measurements 22 23 24 inches in length at center front 73 78 83 inches in circumference at hem gauge 14 sts & 18 row = 4 inches or 10 cm in stockinette stitch the instructions are bracketed for the different sizes i added bold and bold italics for the larger sizes because ravelry hides some of the brackets you can mark your pattern for the size that you are knitting with 16-inch needles co 96 **104 *112*** sts pm for bor at center back work 7 rounds in k2 p2 rib next round p4 pm k20 ** k10 kfb twice * k5 kfb 4 times* ** pm p4 pm k20 ** k10 kfb twice * k5 kfb 4 times*** pm p4 pm k20 ** k10 kfb twice * k5 kfb 4 times*** pm p4 pm k20 ** k10 kfb twice * k5 kfb 4 times*** 96 **112 *128*** sts 1 https //www cascadeyarns com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/a400_elysian6_swoncho pdf
